name: Shapecss
tagline: this is simple css and js library for generate shapes easily.
body:
### Welcome to Shapecss
We found making geometrical shape is not easy but its cumbersome, and need to write many lines of css and javascripts. So we wanted to make it flexable like tag, like h1, h2 or p or body. So you can use this tags, circle, triangle, square, rectangle, parallelogram.

### Documentation
Shape CSS (currently v1.1) has a few easy ways to quickly get started, each one appealing to a different skill level and use case. Read through to see what suits your particular needs.
[documentation](https://www.shapecss.com/documentation)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
